name: Color Coordinated
description:
Become Robie the robot and tumble along with him through different stages by pressing the correct keys corresponding to the color and reach the finishing tile before the time runs out or Robie dies.

(Due to limited time the instructions are given here for now.)

Instructions

Keys - WASD or Arrow keys

The keys are mapped to specific colors shown on the top right of the screen. 

A prompt appears on screen to tell you which key to press (green here) to move to the next tile ( which is Right key or D here)

The position indicated for the keys remains the same  but the colors change with a SWITCH on the screen.

Don't press the wrong key or Robie will take damage. With enough damage, Robie will die before reaching the finishing tile.

Game made for the GMTK game jam themed "out of control".

The game abides by the theme due to its controls which switch and go out of order frequently.
